title: Web-Based Intensive Short-Term Arabic Course for Tourism Purposes

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic Arabic vocabulary and sentence structures
context.additional_context: Course for learners in managerial/leadership roles to acquire tourism-related Arabic expressions needed in work environments. Enhanced situational practice via smartphone-based accessibility and VR simulations.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately use over 50 essential Arabic expressions required in tourism settings.
Learners perform Arabic communication scenarios for three situational contexts (hotel check-in, restaurant ordering, etc.) via VR simulation.
Learners achieve over 80% proficiency by conducting self-assessments within three months after class completion using web-based learning materials.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
